chapter.title: Hardware Setup
chapter.para: This chapter contains reference to configure hardware drivers for different types of SS7 cards.

&THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; supports dahdi based SS7 cards like diguim and sangoma. Generally dahdi based SS7 crads doesn't have MTP2/MTP3 support on board and relies on external software to provide these services.
&THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; also supports dialogic based SS7 cards which has on board support for MTP2/MTP3
